jobDescription: Job DescriptionPA Consulting Group transforms Life Sciences organizations by working directly with executive teams to design, develop and deploy sophisticated operational and IT systems. We start them off in the right direction and stay with them every step of the way. Our priority is to build lasting partnerships with our clients and make sure their new or existing IT services fit their organization and its goals. What can PA offer you? Original, strategic and operational consulting that makes a real business difference to high-profile clients. We never offer second-hand work or ready-made solutions.The opportunity to work in committed teams that blend in-depth industry experience with high quality consulting expertise. Intelligent and interesting colleagues who will develop and challenge you.A transparent career path where your advancement is objectively measured, enabling you to achieve your full potential.A compelling benefits package that is competitive with the market and designed to reward you for achieving success.Job RequirementsWhat we want: You should have a track record of successful project delivery working within a major professional services consulting firm.
